title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Keeping Your Pets Safe and Happy Pets are welcome at the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site- but to protect other visitors, wildlife and your pets themselves, please remember these regulations:  Pets must be leashed (6' or shorter leash) at all times. You must clean up after your pet(s). You may not leave a tethered pet unattended. Pets may be allowed to walk the walkway at the farm but must be on a leash. They are not allowed in the Carter Home or the Clark House.      Pet Boarding We suggest that you contact the local Chamber of Commerce for suggestions on kennel services in the area.
